title: Looking for top laner for competitive 5v5 and clash
body:
I am looking for a top laner to complete my team we want to form a strong team for clash and create a good well rounded competitive team.

If you are interested add me and we can talk further

P.S preferable a silver player

replies.body: I'm gold but I'd be interested!
cool add me on league and we might be able to play a practice 5 man tonight
or even someone who no one plays so theres no chance of them getting banned like singed
